data.text: @Boxy_83 @nycgov U are just dumb, look up what blackmail is … you can simply not get it and choose to not get 100 dollars. Ppl like you are why we have an electoral college because u are clearly an uneducated mess of a human.

@nycgov I know most of the people in this comment section are New Yorkers. Does anyone know of any cheap studio apartments or basement apartments in NYC? I’m living at my boyfriends family apartment and I can’t find anywhere I can afford.
@nycgov What about School mask mandate in @nycgov ?? @NYCMayor ?? @DOEChancellor ??? @NYCSchools ???
@nycgov This is wrong. Paying people to get the vaccine. Just no. Its personal choice. What you are offering is nothing short of blackmail!
@nycgov i got my covid vaccine and was promised 100 dollars at my doctors and they didn’t give me any

@nycgov The new variant is extremely infectious. Use app Bost instead to safely communicate at physical distance. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/AjUViEhxyr
